1.title: Hairy Situation
1.plot: Demetria (Dee) Howell, 37 year old single mother (guardian of niece) and Los Angeles native was placed in foster care at an early age because of her mother's alcoholism. She was eventually adopted and raised by her aunt and out of high school studied cosmetology because of her love of hair. Her life was headed along a good path working out of a salon, owning her own townhome and able to meet the demands that life sent, until she got involved with the wrong crowd and served a 4-year stint in prison for being wrongly accused of drug trafficking. Determined to make the ...

imdb.plot outline: The much-anticipated show, hosted by Lanika Wise and OKTV's CEO, Xavier "X" Mitchell, aims to reward the silent heroes of America who put others before themselves each and every day. It's a show centered around the concept of giving back to those who have given so much to others. The 12-part series aims to give deserving individuals throughout the U.S. opportunities to pursue their dreams. Applicants can nominate either themselves or somebody else through a simple submission process where they have the chance to expand upon the achievements and sacrifices made by the individual. This positive message of the show helps OKTV to support its mission of bringing families back together through engaging programming.
